about_the_game:
Escape the Nightmare

Phil wakes up, trapped in a dark basement with no memory of the past hours. What started as a harmless camping trip has turned into a living nightmare. As you navigate the shadowy halls, one question constantly haunts you: Are you truly alone? Or is something lurking in the darkness, watching your every move?

A Survival Horror Experience Like No Other

Take on the role of Phil in this gripping horror/escape game and face a chilling world filled with mystery and terror.

Gameplay Features:

  • Puzzles: Solve intricate challenges to piece together the truth.

  • Collectables: Discover hidden items and clues that unravel Phil's story.

  • Jumpscares: Stay alert terror strikes when you least expect it.

  • Atmospheric Tension: Every step could be your last as you explore the eerie environment.

  • And more: Unearth additional gameplay mechanics that will test your nerves.

Will You Escape the Basement Alive?

The key lies in your hands, but beware sometimes, it's better not to uncover everything.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headset required

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
